content:
This has come up many times @David Hay , and they are similar, but also quite different.
There could be 1 provenance statement, but many many many VerificationResults as the verification process dictates, 6 monthly checks, and what was done
BTW - I added the chat link to conman - better late that never :)
I really like the clarification David wrote on his blog article. @David Hay can you craft a CR to update the FHIR spec to make the FHRI spec more clear between the two?
Thanks, David for filling in the gaps on ConMan.
No worries - are you planning on another virtual connectathon?
We are unsure but will circle back with next steps.
